page.title: 19THE MILL PARK ESTATE
page.content:
Designed in the late 1950's as an overspill estate for Birkenhead and Ellesmere Port, Mill park contains all the elements of council estate design in that period of rapid change.
There are four storey maisonettes ,semi detached houses, terrace houses, shops with living accomodation above, health centres, a special school and even a library.all built aroun carfully constructed squares or straight lines on the edge of the countryside.
Since the re-oganisation of the County boundaries it has become the resposibility of the Wirral Borough Housing Authority and little has been done to maintain it's upkeep.
